name: KryptCrawler
description: KryptCrawler brings classic first person, grid based Dungeon Crawler gameplay to your PC and VR. Descend into the unknown and explore the perilous depth of the sinister tombs and crypts you are thrown into, armed with nothing but a map and your wits.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2700 MB available space Additional Notes: For playing in VR: please check the general Oculus Rift requirements
